title: Citizens插件的NPC问题
author: Blood_Donors
txt_content: 如题，我想让npc可以像村民那样换东西，我看有些服可以这样，求怎么设置

replies.author: think君
replies.txt_content:
think君 发表于 2016-3-22 18:47
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-456452-1-1.html
噗，手误发出去了
里面的图挂了
具体就是/shopkeeper npc
然后就有一个shopkeeper的村民你也可以对这个村民输入npc改变的指令

replies.author: think君
replies.txt_content:
Blood_Donors 发表于 2016-3-22 19:09
The shop object type "citizen" is disabled
确定NPC插件没被禁言或者已经下载

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Blood_Donors
replies.txt_content:
Blood_Donors 发表于 2016-3-22 19:09
The shop object type "citizen" is disabled
- -机番？

replies.author: KTR
replies.txt_content: 找到Shopkeepers的配置文件，搜索citizen，会有一个citizen的，后面true就行
